item.title: Project: Retrieve Files From Remote Computer Through E-mail
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: I came across this post on lifehacker today (original post and solution here), which talks about a method of retrieving files from a remote computer through e-mail. Pretty archaic, I know, but again, it is a very simple method and works behind all the firewalls and stuff . But, the catch is that it is only for macâ€™s. Thought of creating something similar for the PC and mashed together some code during lunch time at office to make our dear old outlook remote-file-sending-capable.
